emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Synthesis
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems capable of autonomously writing complex software from high-level specifications, reducing human coding involvement significantly.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential job displacement in coding roles; increase in software development speed and quality.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires substantial trust in AI's decision-making capabilities, regulatory frameworks for AI-generated code, and integration with existing development tools.

emerging_technologies.name: Fully Autonomous Vehicles
emerging_technologies.description: Vehicles that operate without human intervention in all driving conditions, transforming logistics and personal transport.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduction in accidents, changes in urban design, potential job loss in driving professions.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Legal frameworks, public trust in autonomous systems, and infrastructure adjustments for AV integration.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural Lace Technology
emerging_technologies.description: A brain-computer interface that enhances human cognitive abilities by integrating digital technology directly with neural tissue.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Raises privacy concerns, potential for cognitive enhancement inequality, ethical considerations in human augmentation.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory approval, ethical considerations, public acceptance of invasive technology.

emerging_technologies.name: Space Resource Utilization
emerging_technologies.description: Technologies for harvesting and processing resources from celestial bodies to support space colonization efforts.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Expansion of human presence in space, economic shifts due to extraterrestrial resource availability.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological feasibility, international space law, environmental impact on Earth.

emerging_technologies.name: Zero-Waste Smart Cities
emerging_technologies.description: Cities designed to minimize waste through advanced recycling, energy recovery, and sustainable living practices.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Promotes sustainability, potential for higher living costs initially, shift in urban lifestyle.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Government policies, public environmental consciousness, and economic incentives.

emerging_technologies.name: Decentralized Digital Identity
emerging_technologies.description: A system where individuals control their digital identity through blockchain, reducing reliance on centralized authorities.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances privacy but introduces new security challenges and potential for misuse.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Legal recognition, user education on blockchain technology, and integration with existing systems.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI-Powered Development Environments
mainstream_technologies.description: Development environments where AI provides real-time code suggestions, bug fixes, and even entire feature implementations.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in tech companies, becoming a standard in software development.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Last-Mile Delivery
mainstream_technologies.description: Drones and ground robots that deliver packages from distribution centers to end consumers.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming common in urban and suburban areas, reducing delivery times and costs.

epoch_themes.description: AI permeates every industry, driving automation to unprecedented levels.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Significant job market transformation, need for new education and training paradigms.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on AI ethics, regulation, and human-AI collaboration.

epoch_themes.description: Cities evolve to be more sustainable through technology, focusing on reducing waste and enhancing livability.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Improved quality of life, potential for urban sprawl control, environmental benefits.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global push towards green infrastructure, urban planning reforms.

epoch_themes.description: Space technology advances, focusing on resource utilization and human settlement.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Expansion of human activity beyond Earth, new economic opportunities.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased international cooperation in space, emergence of space commerce.
